title: the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (Seed of
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (Seed of 

Oil Plants and Fibre Plants) (Amendment) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (seed oil plant fibre plants) (amendment) regulation 2020

title: the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: 2. The European Communities (Seed of Oil Plants and Fibre Plants)
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Seed of Oil Plants and Fibre Plants) 
Regulations 2003 (S.I. No. 280 of 2003) are amended by substituting in 
Regulation 2(1) for the definition of “EC Directive” (as amended by the 
European Communities (Seed of Oil Plants and Fibre Plants) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 678 of 2016)) the following: 

“‘Directive’ means Council Directive 2002/57/EC of 13 June 20022 (as 
amended by Council Directive 2002/68/EC of 19 July 20023, 
Commission Directive 2003/45/EC of 28 May 20034, Council Directive 
2003/61/EC of 18 June 20035, Council Directive 2004/117/EC of 22 
December 20046, Commission Directive 2009/74/EC of 26 June 20097, 
Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2016/11 of 5 January 20168, 
Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2016/317 of 3 March 20169 
subject to Commission Regulation (EC) No 217/200610 of 8 February 
2006 as it relates to oil and fibre plants and Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2020/177 of 11 February 2020;”. 

1 O.J. L41, 13.02.2020, P.1 
2 O.J. L193, 20.07.2002, P.74 
3 O.J. L 195, 24.07.2002, P. 32

10 O.J. L38, 09.02.2006. P. 17 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th June, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [201] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 May, 2020. 

MICHAEL CREED, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [201]

title: the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2020/177 by amending the Annexes I and II to Directive 
2002/57/EC as they relate to inspections for Union regulated non-quarantine 
pests (RNQPs) and measures intended to prevent their presence on seeds of oil 
and fibre plants for planting. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [201] 5
